baseAttack.name: FLAMETHROWER_BASE
baseAttack.description: mode: Choose a square 1 move away and possibly a second square 1 more move away in the same direction. On each square, you may choose 1 target and give it 1 damage.

alternativeAttack.name: FLAMETHROWER_OP1
alternativeAttack.description: Choose 2 squares as above. Deal 2 damage to everyone on the first square and 1 damage to everyone on the second square.
